name: In Between - independent game on DEATH
name_original: In Between - independent game on DEATH
description:
This game creates a special status between living and death, called ‘In Between’. In this special grey status, dying wishes may be fulfilled and stories of the past may be revealed. 

By interacting with gravestones and epitaphs, you unravel and remember the glitters of life once lived, thus to ease the pain of losing a loved one.
